website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a stylish boot you can wear in all weather.
pros: Lined with natural sheep's fur to help keep you warm in the coldest weather
Tall 9-inch shaft keeps more of your leg protected
cons: Not as much arch support as some of the other boots from Sperry

customer_reviews.title: They were so comfortable on a very long walk
customer_reviews.text: Received these boots last week, and took them out hiking through the snow today. They were so comfortable on a very long walk, good traction, and waterproof. I didn't find them exceptionally warm, I will still wear heavy socks with them. I went to No***troms first and tried them on before ordering on Amazon. My normal size is 8 1/2, the 9 fit comfortably. Good boots, they look like they will last a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Great cold weather boot. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I tried on my standard size (6) in a different style and they were huge. So I ordered a full size down and the footbed fits perfect with a thinner pair of smartwool right out of the box. But I don’t have a skinny foot and the rubber to leather seam is tight on one foot. I’m counting on them to stretch, but ideally I’d say order half of a size down if you have a smaller foot. If you want to wear chunky socks, order your real size, though these are lined. They are seriously so plush and cooshy. They will definitely keep my feet warm in our soggy, cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable even for "picky" feet
customer_reviews.text: I have "picky feet" with narrow heels and slight bunions on each foot (TMI, sorry). These fit extremely well and are incredibly comfortable, even for long walks. Easy to pull on with zippers up, just by untying the laces. They have a black pattern in the back along the calf which could have been any other color to look a bit more "femmy" - this is my only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: midyear68

customer_reviews.title: ... a size 8 but the shoe was too big better suited for someone that is a size 9
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 and ordered a size 8 but the shoe was too big better suited for someone that is a size 9. Other than that very pretty just as pictured, had to return mine but will be ordering a smaller size. I wear a size 7 in Converse so I added a picture just to show the difference. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortable, Stylish, and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm, even trekking through deep snow. They have kept their shape and color and are very comfortable. Traction is great on ice and they look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great boot from Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Great boot from Sperry! Fit is perfect, I usually go a half size up on the sperrry duck boots but it wasn't available at the time of purchase but they still fit great. My only complaint would be that they don't do great in very cold temperatures, my toes do get cold. I still wear them though.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBones

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved to be able to have kept these but realizing the my legs are so long, the round toe just didn't do me justice. However, they are super cute and the color is beautiful! Sperry nailed this idea. If they had a more pointed toe, they would still be mine.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boots!!!!! I've been eyeing them for quite some time, and I was thrilled when they arrived. They are the perfect height (my calves are a bit wider than most) and fit perfectly throughout. In Virginia, our weather is hit or miss, and I'm very excited to try them out this fall & winter. If you're thinking about buying them- do it! You won't be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oceanlover831

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously great
customer_reviews.text: So very warm and comfy, all day great love them. Will definitely buy more pairs of these boots. Love them, live in them in winter/fall/spring. Keep feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: Amy .R.

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots but i noticed how there's 2 colors at the top as if its stained. I really did not want green and beige but black as i thought i ordered. Will probably be returning these. it took me weeks to find these and to have to find things to match sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super comfy with and without socks. My toes got a little cold when worn to a football game. I suggest a thicker sock when in the cold for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: mskish

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super snug and warm. Fits as expected. I love the way they look and can’t wait to see how they hold up for this upcoming winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have been fine with a 8 maybe7
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 7-8, so after reading some reviews went up a size to 8.5. I would have been fine with a 8 maybe7.5. I always wear thick socks with them so they aren't so loose. Otherwise these boots are awesome. So cute and pretty warm.
customer_reviews.author: gilligirl

customer_reviews.title: Sperry did it again!
customer_reviews.text: Sperry does not disappoint. Comfortable. One of my foot is 2.5UK (4.5US), another 3UK/5US. So, one foot fits well and another slightly loose. But hey, that is just me. Anti-slip? Yes! Warm? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: I just got these boots in today. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these boots in today. I was tracking them and couldn't wait; however, the boots are damaged. The leather that holds the shoe laces was not sewn properly from the manufacturer. Returning them tomorrow. My question to the boot lovers or owners is does your boot squeak or make noise when you walk in them??
customer_reviews.author: M.Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost always a size 7 but after reading some reviews saying these ran small, I ordered a size 7.5. Even the 7.5 was a bit too small, especially with my wool socks. I ended up exchanging them for an 8 which fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad i bought them. They look great and feel comfortable. I live in Seattle and they have come in handy with the rain and snow we get.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots! The rubber was a bit tight at first but they have loosened up nicely. They look amazing and they're pretty warm for not having the thinsulate.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute, and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the get go, cute and stylish! Feel like they were broken in by the second time I wore them, having no pain that's usually associated with that. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KO210

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I feel like they might run a tad big but it would depend on how thick of socks you normally wear. Super comfortable and an easy go to with leggings or skinny jeans. Well made boot definitely will last and I feel worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Breannan Winder

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Really like these boots seen them in store took a picture and researched where to get the boots and paid 60.00 less.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Cold Weather/Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: I already have these in navy/brown... and love them so much that I bought the grey! Love these boots. Warm, waterproof, and very cute. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ann O

customer_reviews.title: I got these for a girls trip so my feet would not get wet and they did not disappoint. My feet are super dry
customer_reviews.text: Omg yall. I got these for a girls trip so my feet would not get wet and they did not disappoint. My feet are super dry. In short these boots are lit af
customer_reviews.author: mstrymxer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. It's a cute boot for the winter slosh.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fabulous! Fit to size, very warm. Got so much compliment. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine McLean Alfred

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is NOT what was advertised. It is a completely different product by a different brand. It’s hard to even call it a dupe or fake because it’s a different style duck boot.
customer_reviews.author: clarence hughes

customer_reviews.title: Ice skating
customer_reviews.text: They have no grip ice. I suggest not to wear it on ice.
customer_reviews.author: Joyceyyyyy

customer_reviews.title: A little large but great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are a little big but that's fine because I wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise GREAT boots.
customer_reviews.text: There was a manufactures default inside the boot that cut into my ankle. Returned them to Sperry no problem. Otherwise GREAT boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These beauties came just in time for my trip to Denver (literally the day before I left). They are warm and surprisingly very comfortable to walk long distances. I’m overly pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph522

customer_reviews.title: LOVE thes boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE thes boots! I usually wear a 7.5-8, I ordered a 7.5 and they fit perfect.. even with thick socks! The quality of these shoes surpasses any other that I've tried. They're easy to take off and put on and provide great insulation against water and cold. I may buy another pair just so I know that I'll have a back up pair!
customer_reviews.author: S Shuf

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and look great with skinny jeans. Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Joanna Martocci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Very comfortable. Get lots of compliments on them. Can tuck pants inside or have on outside.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is comfortable, stylish and functional. Buy 1/2 size larger .
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wear appropriate socks with these boots in cold weather. My toes went numb...
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: strange fabric color
customer_reviews.text: only 3 stars because as previously mentioned in another review the fabric portion of the boot is a greenish color. not black as depicted in picture. its hard to match outfits to the boots. not sure why Sperry chose that color. boot fits true to size and is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: i love these boots
customer_reviews.text: i love these boots...they are all i wanted and more!! the boots are warm and just tall enough to be really useful in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look! I love the lace look with the zip close and the blue/brown contrast. I wore them in snow and my feet were dry and it was amazing. I would wear thicker socks with them to help keep your toes warm where the rubber is. The best boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this boots. I bought them because both the reviews and the description state they will be waterproof and warm. I've worn them maybe twice and both times my feet ended up wet and cold. They are NOT waterproof or good in cold, wintery climates with snow.
customer_reviews.author: Dkw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fit. Super cute with skinny jeans!
customer_reviews.author: teresa c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, but..
customer_reviews.text: The boots look great, and are quite waterproof. They are larger than anticipated, but not large enough that a size down can fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style but it rubbed against the sides of my feet causing sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! I wear them all the time great quality and warm
customer_reviews.author: lde09

customer_reviews.title: Love my duck boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my duck boots , delivered as is , in great shape . Get compliments whenever I wear them !
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jose

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like picture and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: High quality boot at a very reasonable price. Looks exactly like picture and very comfortable. Might buy them in every color available!
customer_reviews.author: Sarj

customer_reviews.title: Sperrys never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, and I can hardly wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: HMD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and got them two days later!! They fit great!!
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Harbison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Fits comfy and warm and look trendy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: So bummed they came with a defect
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and comfortable, not too heavy as I feared they might be. The leather is soft and they feel sturdy. Unfortunately one of the buckles arrived broken so ill be returning them. It would have been 5 stars if they came in wearable condition. I hope they restock my size in the color i wanted soon 😭
customer_reviews.author: sahela finley

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return these boots. They are very cute, fit great and are comfortable. But I was not even able to leave the house with them as when I pulled to tighten the laces, one of the straps holding the laces popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Rita H.

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Just received my boots and I ordered 8.5 which the box says and I can't get my foot in them. I look at the shoe size and they are 7.5. Spent all this money and couldn't wait to get them and I can't wear them. Such a bad transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Waller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. Could have some more arch support and insulation.
customer_reviews.author: BizWiz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 7. 5 but based on ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7.5 but based on the reviews I should have ordered my correct shoe size instead on half a step up.... either way I would have to return them because a size 8 was in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Torrealba89

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because the seller smashed the shoe box into a smaller box for shipping. When opening I was worried it damaged the shoes also. It didn't but the seller should have been much more careful in packaging. I love the shoes and wear them a lot. I am in a job that requires me to be outdoors and hiking through mud and rain. These are perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Pictured item is NOT what I received.
customer_reviews.text: The pictured item is NOT what I received at all!!! Not even the same boot. I got a totally different color and it is a shorter shaft, no buckle detail like the photo. I’m VERYdisappointed. I DO NOT WANT THIS ITEM. I WANT WHAT I ORDERED EXACTLY AS THE PHOTO SHOWS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an 8 and I'm not sure if I should go 8.5 or 9. Otherwise they are super warm, even a little small was comfy. I got them after trying a pair or Sorel's that just disappointed. I am also unhappy that I can't get a synthetic fur.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Collins

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Boots
customer_reviews.text: The grey distressed leather is beautiful. I normally wear a size 8 but the 7 1/2 fit better even with a wool sock. I have a slim ankle and I like that these fit snuggly without flopping against my shin, yet I can still pull it on without unzipping it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Women's Saltwater Misty Rain Boot
product_meta.description: The Saltwater Misty is a more rugged take on our Duck-inspired favorite. Built for braving the elements, this boot features Wave-Siping for ultimate traction, a micro-fleeced lining for warmth underfoot, and a premium buckle for a secure fit.
